svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ EXPERIMENT TYPES │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ BY SCOPE: │ │ ├── Feature Launch: New functionality │ │ ├── Optimization: Improve existing feature │ │ ├── Bug Fix: Verify fix doesn't regress │ │ └── Infrastructure: Backend changes │ │ │ │ BY DURATION: │ │ ├── Short-term: 1-2 weeks (quick validation) │ │ ├── Standard: 2-4 weeks (typical A/B test) │ │ └── Long-term: 1-3 months (lifetime value tests) │ │ │ │ BY TRAFFIC: │ │ ├── Full-traffic: 100% of eligible users │ │ ├── Partial: Subset of users (10-50%) │ │ └── Targeted: Specific segment only │ │ │ │ BY ANALYSIS: │ │ ├── Fixed-horizon: Analyze at predetermined end │ │ ├── Sequential: Continuous monitoring with stopping rules │ │ └── Bayesian: Update beliefs as data arrives │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
